title: It’s Complete! The School Idol Rangers!!
detail_text: <:th_ch0105/>Kanata-saaan, hurry up!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>W-, waaait~! You’re going too fast, You-chan~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Ahaha, sorry. But we won’t get a good seat if we don’t hurry.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Hngh, we can’t have that.... Kanata’s dash~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Still, the play premiered not too long ago, but to think that we’re getting a complete version already~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>They gave their all preparing for it~. And guess what? They added a new member!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Eeeh!? Who is it!? Aw man, I should’ve asked to join too~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Kanata also wanted to play a barista or something~<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0105/>Alright! Let’s ask to join them before their next stage!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0206/>Yeah! We can get everyone to hype the School Idol Rangers even more~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
